author: Helen Pederslie
title: Helen Pederslie
text:
I LOVE the ring! Itâ€™s beautifully done and everything is absolutely to done to the right proportion. From the purchase of the stone, to the design, and the fabrication of the ring, the entire process was smoothly managed. Most of all, the end product is stunning!
I wore it today, and my real estate clients all stared at my hand :)
